flipColorOfPieces(Location, Location) - Method in class OthelloPlayer
Changes (flips) the color of the pieces to the current player's color in the locations from start (included) to end (not included)

O

OthelloGame - Class in <Unnamed>
An OthelloGame object represents an Othello game.
OthelloGame() - Constructor for class OthelloGame
Constructs an Othello game.
Postcondition: players.length == 2; players[0] contains a human Othello player; players[1] contains a computer Othello player; The world has been shown.
OthelloPlayer - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the top-level class for all player classes.

Constructs an Othello player object.
OthelloRunner - Class in <Unnamed>
Application that creates a new Othello game and plays it.
